channel.title: Tekken on The Writer's Daily
channel.description: Recent content in Tekken on The Writer's Daily

item.title: #16 - Tekken
item.description: The Question: How do you deal with stress? The Topic: The game that got me into fighters. The Viewermail: I help an asexual man out because I’m just a good guy.

item.title: #16 - Tekken
item.description: the_question How do you deal with stress? Maybe you don’t deal with it at all. (screaming into a pillow) Maybe you’re one of those hot Yoga teachers (calm and zen) Personally I like to punch children. For me it’s about being pro-active with my mental health. the_topic Tekken I started playing Tekken 7 earlier in 2020. It’s the first serious fighting game that I’ve played which actually clicked for me.
